explains: n. 猫步；狭小通道；桥上人行道

sentences.en: The models sashayed down the catwalk.
sentences.cn: 模特们优雅地大步走下T型台。

sentences.en: On the catwalk the models stomped around in thigh-high leather boots.
sentences.cn: T形台上，时装模特儿穿着长及大腿的皮靴，噔噔地走来走去。

sentences.en: "The Internet helps build the awareness and desire by letting so many people peep into the catwalk, " Mr. Kapferer said.
sentences.cn: 卡普弗雷尔说：“通过让很多人窥视时装秀，互联网有助于建立意识和渴望。”
